item.title: Ta'anit Bechorot/B'dikat Chametz Thursday
item.content: <p><strong>Ta'anit Bechorot</strong></p> <p>Traditionally, first-born males fast on this day. Ta'anit Bechorot recognizes that the first-born children of the Israelites were saved when the first-born children of the Egpytians were killed. &nbsp;When Pesach begins on Saturday night, this fast is moved to the Thursday before Pesach.</p>
